description: Odd numbers that are the sum of two numbers with the same digits.
mathematica: dtn[ L_ ] := Fold[ 10*#1+#2&, 0, L ] f[ n_ ] := Module[ {}, a=IntegerDigits[ n ]; b=Map[ dtn, Select[ Permutations[ a ], First[ # ]>0& ] ] ] g[ n_ ] := Select[ Flatten[ Outer[ Plus, f[ n ], f[ n ] ] ], OddQ ] Union[ Flatten[ Table[ g[ n ], {n, 1, 999} ] ] ]
author: _Erich Friedman_, Jun 23 2001
